input_text.Prompt:
Given a product name and product features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product name:
Rolf Glass Etched Olive Branch Martini Glass (Set of 4), 10 oz, Clear

Product features:
Capacity of 10 Ounces
Diamond-Wheel in Engraved
Dishwasher Safe
Made in the USA
Contains Set of 4
input_text.Response A:
, 10 oz Martini Glasses

The Rolf Glass Etched Olive Branch Martini Glass (Set of 4) combines the functionality of a traditional martini glass with the timeless elegance of etched glass. This set of four glasses features a beautiful olive branch design that is sand-etched onto the surface. The extra-large 10-ounce capacity is perfect for enjoying your favorite martini or cocktail. The glass is dishwasher safe for easy cleaning and care. Made in the USA, the Rolf Glass Etched Olive Branch Martini Glass (Set of 4) is a stunning addition to your home bar or entertaining collection.
input_text.Response B: These olive branch martini glasses are a great way to serve your guests in style. The beautiful etched design is dishwasher safe, making cleanup a breeze. These glasses are made in the USA and have a capacity of 10 ounces. Each set contains 4 glasses.

label_annotations.feedback: Neither mentioned diamond-wheel engraved but I don't know what that is!
